data.title: WGAC Radio Advertising Costs
data.meta_description: How much does it cost to advertise on WGAC-FM. Find radio advertising rates for WGAC-FM in Georgia.
data.text:
How much does it cost to advertise on WGAC-FM? This is your source for radio advertising costs.

Why Advertise on WGAC?

WGAC-FM listeners in the Augusta, GA area are waiting to hear from you about your offerings. The parent organization for this radio station is Beasley Broadcast Group. The radio station format is news and talk. To hear WGAC, turn your dial to 93.1 FM.

Cost of WGAC-FM Radio Advertising

The estimated rate for radio ads is $25.00. Note: Individual radio station rates are not readily available. Our estimates are based on regional averages and may be very inaccurate. Advertising rate estimates are typically for a 30 second spot. Seasonal factors and volume discounts should also be considered. Contact the radio station's advertising department for an exact quote on their current rates. In some cases, our estimated rates may be significantly different from the actual current rates...so be sure to get your ad prices from the station before completing your budgeting.

Contact the advertising department at (706) 396-7000 for radio ad prices or more information.

WGAC-FM Contact Information

WGAC-FM

4051 Jimmie Dyess Pkwy

Augusta, GA

Phone: (706) 396-7000

Fax: (706) 396-7100

To update or correct radio advertising information on this page, please use the link below:
